<p>Have you ever suffered from any mental illness?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="ill" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="ill" value="0"> No<br>

<p>Have you ever thought about or attempted to kill yourself?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="self" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="self" value="0"> No<br>
  
<p>Other factors: Do you expect that you will fail to pass Data Science?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="ds" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="ds" value="0"> No<br>
  
<input type="submit" value="Submit"><br>

```{js, echo=FALSE}
function allHide() {
  $(".pass").hide();
  $(".sad").hide();
  $(".risky").hide();
  $(".sorry").hide();
  $(".suicide").hide();
}
allHide();
$("input[type='submit']").click(function(){
  var ill = parseInt($("input[name='ill']:checked").val());
  var self = parseInt($("input[name='self']:checked").val());
  var ds = parseInt($("input[name='ds']:checked").val());
  var total = ill + self + ds;
  if(total==3){
    allHide();
    $(".suicide").show();
  }else if(total==0){
    allHide();
    $(".pass").show();
  }else if(total==2){
    allHide();
    $(".sorry").show();
  }else{
    if(ds==1){
      allHide();
      $(".sad").show();
    }else{
      allHide();
      $(".risky").show();
    }
  }
  
});
```
